texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: You discovered a problem at work. If left unchecked, the problem could affect customers and impact revenue. You cannot ignore it.
texts.text: You discovered a problem at work. If left unchecked, the problem could affect customers and impact revenue. You cannot ignore it.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: What now? Who do you tell? Will they  listen? Better yet, will they  understand?
texts.text: What now? Who do you tell? Will they  listen? Better yet, will they  understand?

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I find myself in situations like these constantly. My roles over the years involved problems that demanded discussion, thought, and solutions. Some problems were simple but others required complicated fixes that took months or years.
texts.text: I find myself in situations like these constantly. My roles over the years involved problems that demanded discussion, thought, and solutions. Some problems were simple but others required complicated fixes that took months or years.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Communicating with other people about complex problems remains a challenge for me, but I learned a new tool that helps me kick off these discussions and share my recommended solutions as efficiently as possible. The  SBAR  technique shows up frequently in medical settings but it also works well in IT.
texts.text: Communicating with other people about complex problems remains a challenge for me, but I learned a new tool that helps me kick off these discussions and share my recommended solutions as efficiently as possible. The  SBAR  technique shows up frequently in medical settings but it also works well in IT.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: This post covers the nuts and bolts of the SBAR format, how to use it to your advantage, and how to communicate clearly with it.
texts.text: This post covers the nuts and bolts of the SBAR format, how to use it to your advantage, and how to communicate clearly with it.

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Components
texts.text: Components

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Every SBAR contains four components. Let's go through each one.
texts.text: Every SBAR contains four components. Let's go through each one.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Situation
texts.text: Situation

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Hook the reader with an explanation of the events happening  right now . Save the backstory for later and focus on the shortest possible list of current events.
texts.text: Hook the reader with an explanation of the events happening  right now . Save the backstory for later and focus on the shortest possible list of current events.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Let's use a favorite example that every system administrator can relate to: a server is down. Your situation section might look something like this:
texts.text: Let's use a favorite example that every system administrator can relate to: a server is down. Your situation section might look something like this:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Situation
texts.text: Situation

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Web01 stopped responding at 3PM today and disrupted web traffic to our website at example.com. We cannot process orders online and customers cannot browse our list of products. The marketing team must update the website by the end of the day with information about next week's trade show.
texts.text: Web01 stopped responding at 3PM today and disrupted web traffic to our website at example.com. We cannot process orders online and customers cannot browse our list of products. The marketing team must update the website by the end of the day with information about next week's trade show.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: The situation section includes several critical pieces of information:
texts.text: The situation section includes several critical pieces of information:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: What is happening
texts.text: What is happening

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Who is affected by the problem
texts.text: Who is affected by the problem

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: How does the problem affect people
texts.text: How does the problem affect people

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Do you see a pattern? Do you see it  right now? This section demands short sentences, active language  (more on that later) , and a focus on  right now. Your efforts here charge up the reader to continue into the next section which is often the longest.
texts.text: Do you see a pattern? Do you see it  right now? This section demands short sentences, active language  (more on that later) , and a focus on  right now. Your efforts here charge up the reader to continue into the next section which is often the longest.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Background
texts.text: Background

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Now that you won your reader's attention, start giving some backstory. Let's continue our example above about our unresponsive server:
texts.text: Now that you won your reader's attention, start giving some backstory. Let's continue our example above about our unresponsive server:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Background
texts.text: Background

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Our datacenter technicians replaced the power supply on web01 last week following a power surge. They found a broken case fan after replacing the power supply and they replaced that as well. Fred called the server vendor about the failures and they warned us that we may have a damaged motherboard following the power surge. Jennifer ordered a replacement motherboard which arrives this Friday.
texts.text: Our datacenter technicians replaced the power supply on web01 last week following a power surge. They found a broken case fan after replacing the power supply and they replaced that as well. Fred called the server vendor about the failures and they warned us that we may have a damaged motherboard following the power surge. Jennifer ordered a replacement motherboard which arrives this Friday.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: The server crashed abruptly and rebooted two more times since the maintenance. Normally the server rebooted without any problems, but it did not come back online after today's crash.
texts.text: The server crashed abruptly and rebooted two more times since the maintenance. Normally the server rebooted without any problems, but it did not come back online after today's crash.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: This section adds color and detail about the events that led up to the current situation. It answers that question that executives enjoy asking:  "How did we get here?"
texts.text: This section adds color and detail about the events that led up to the current situation. It answers that question that executives enjoy asking:  "How did we get here?"

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Avoid two main pitfalls here:
texts.text: Avoid two main pitfalls here:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Stick to facts, not opinions or your intepretation.
texts.text: Stick to facts, not opinions or your intepretation.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Keep the facts pertinent and relevant.
texts.text: Keep the facts pertinent and relevant.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: The reader now understands the events happening right now and they know how we got here. Now your experience and expertise comes into play as you bring all of the data together.
texts.text: The reader now understands the events happening right now and they know how we got here. Now your experience and expertise comes into play as you bring all of the data together.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Assessment
texts.text: Assessment

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: This remains the toughest section for me with any SBAR. You must thread the needle of tying all the facts together without making a recommendation to the reader.
texts.text: This remains the toughest section for me with any SBAR. You must thread the needle of tying all the facts together without making a recommendation to the reader.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Imagine the last action movie you saw where the villain has the ability to do something terrible. After the main character explains what the villian has, how dangerous it is, and how vulnerable the good guys are, everyone looks at them and asks:  "Okay, give it to me straight: How bad is this?"
texts.text: Imagine the last action movie you saw where the villain has the ability to do something terrible. After the main character explains what the villian has, how dangerous it is, and how vulnerable the good guys are, everyone looks at them and asks:  "Okay, give it to me straight: How bad is this?"

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Going back to our server down example:
texts.text: Going back to our server down example:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Assessment
texts.text: Assessment

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: We have very low confidence that web01 can host our website reliably at this critical time for our company. The power surge likely damaged the motherboard, but the replacement does not arrive for three more days. While we hoped to have web02 ready for production this week, it still needs more work.
texts.text: We have very low confidence that web01 can host our website reliably at this critical time for our company. The power surge likely damaged the motherboard, but the replacement does not arrive for three more days. While we hoped to have web02 ready for production this week, it still needs more work.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Take all the facts you have and share your thoughts on where they stand. Readers without your experience or level of familiarity with the situation appreciate this section since it ties the first two sections together. Clearly state the root cause of the current situation, the severity, and the impact if left unresolved. Your goal here is to get the reader to ask the right question for the next section:  "What do we do now?"
texts.text: Take all the facts you have and share your thoughts on where they stand. Readers without your experience or level of familiarity with the situation appreciate this section since it ties the first two sections together. Clearly state the root cause of the current situation, the severity, and the impact if left unresolved. Your goal here is to get the reader to ask the right question for the next section:  "What do we do now?"

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Recommendation
texts.text: Recommendation

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Now it's time to plot a course forward out of the situation and back to happier times. Make clear recommendations that include a  what ,  why , and  how . Assume that every recommendation must survive cross-examination from other engineers and executives.
texts.text: Now it's time to plot a course forward out of the situation and back to happier times. Make clear recommendations that include a  what ,  why , and  how . Assume that every recommendation must survive cross-examination from other engineers and executives.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Our recommendations for fixing our server could include:
texts.text: Our recommendations for fixing our server could include:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Recommendation
texts.text: Recommendation

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Deploy a temporary web server at our public cloud provider to bridge the gap while web01 is awaiting a hardware replacement.
texts.text: Deploy a temporary web server at our public cloud provider to bridge the gap while web01 is awaiting a hardware replacement.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Finish provisioning web02 and configure high availability services so that it can run in active-active mode with web01 as soon as the replacement motherboard arrives.
texts.text: Finish provisioning web02 and configure high availability services so that it can run in active-active mode with web01 as soon as the replacement motherboard arrives.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Repair web01 on Friday and run burn-in tests during the week of the trade show to ensure it operates reliably under load.
texts.text: Repair web01 on Friday and run burn-in tests during the week of the trade show to ensure it operates reliably under load.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Schedule a maintenance after the trade show to tie web01 and web02 together as an H/A pair and move the website traffic back from the cloud provider.
texts.text: Schedule a maintenance after the trade show to tie web01 and web02 together as an H/A pair and move the website traffic back from the cloud provider.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Order a spare parts package from the server vendor to have on hand for future issues with either server.
texts.text: Order a spare parts package from the server vendor to have on hand for future issues with either server.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Be specific and detailed here. Keep the following things in mind:
texts.text: Be specific and detailed here. Keep the following things in mind:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Think about potential objections (time, cost, etc) and address those in the recommendation itself.
texts.text: Think about potential objections (time, cost, etc) and address those in the recommendation itself.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Consider work items beyond the current situation to prevent it from happening again later.
texts.text: Consider work items beyond the current situation to prevent it from happening again later.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: If you have a team working on it, consider multiple simultaneous workstreams and what you could accomplish with each.
texts.text: If you have a team working on it, consider multiple simultaneous workstreams and what you could accomplish with each.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Your reader wants to know what to do, so don't be bashful here. You are an expert and you know the situation well. Tell the reader what must be done, why it must be done, and how to do it (at a high level).
texts.text: Your reader wants to know what to do, so don't be bashful here. You are an expert and you know the situation well. Tell the reader what must be done, why it must be done, and how to do it (at a high level).

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Extra credit
texts.text: Extra credit

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Now that you know all the sections of an SBAR, you're ready to write one! I learned plenty of tips along the way[^tips] and these should help you improve your SBAR skills.
texts.text: Now that you know all the sections of an SBAR, you're ready to write one! I learned plenty of tips along the way[^tips] and these should help you improve your SBAR skills.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: [^tips]: I learned tips from making mistakes. 🤭
texts.text: [^tips]: I learned tips from making mistakes. 🤭

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Use active language
texts.text: Use active language

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: The SBAR format provides an efficient method for communicating complex problems and recommendations with other people. Using active language keeps the readers attention and allows you to speak more directly and forcefully.
texts.text: The SBAR format provides an efficient method for communicating complex problems and recommendations with other people. Using active language keeps the readers attention and allows you to speak more directly and forcefully.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Take the following example:
texts.text: Take the following example:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: The server is down because a cart was rolling down the hallway and it hit the server after a datacenter technician forgot to set the brake.
texts.text: The server is down because a cart was rolling down the hallway and it hit the server after a datacenter technician forgot to set the brake.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Ugh. That's a mouthful. How about this instead:
texts.text: Ugh. That's a mouthful. How about this instead:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: A datacenter technician left a cart unattended on the ramp without setting the brake. The cart rolled down and knocked the server off the rack, taking it offline.
texts.text: A datacenter technician left a cart unattended on the ramp without setting the brake. The cart rolled down and knocked the server off the rack, taking it offline.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Active language keeps the reader's attention by keeping the subject followed by a verb. There's no question of who did what and how that caused a problem. Remove any  passive voice  that you find and look for sentences without a subject followed by a verb.
texts.text: Active language keeps the reader's attention by keeping the subject followed by a verb. There's no question of who did what and how that caused a problem. Remove any  passive voice  that you find and look for sentences without a subject followed by a verb.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Use an appendix
texts.text: Use an appendix

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Sometimes an assessment leads to multiple options for a solution. Add these potential solutions to an appendix and allow readers to review those if they need more detail. This reduces clutter in the main part of the SBAR but allows detail-oriented readers to pull out more context without bothering you.
texts.text: Sometimes an assessment leads to multiple options for a solution. Add these potential solutions to an appendix and allow readers to review those if they need more detail. This reduces clutter in the main part of the SBAR but allows detail-oriented readers to pull out more context without bothering you.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Appendixes are great places for charts, diagrams, and command line output that reinforce your recommendations.
texts.text: Appendixes are great places for charts, diagrams, and command line output that reinforce your recommendations.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Keep it collaborative
texts.text: Keep it collaborative

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: As you write the SBAR, invite others to collaborate with you. My company uses Google Docs heavily and it allows me to bring in more contributors to improve various parts of the document.
texts.text: As you write the SBAR, invite others to collaborate with you. My company uses Google Docs heavily and it allows me to bring in more contributors to improve various parts of the document.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: This also helps when you're ready to present your work. Readers can comment and ask questions right in the document. You can add extra details or answer the questions right in the SBAR document.
texts.text: This also helps when you're ready to present your work. Readers can comment and ask questions right in the document. You can add extra details or answer the questions right in the SBAR document.

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Wrapping up
texts.text: Wrapping up

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: The SBAR process offers you a great opportunity to improve your communication skills as an engineer, especially when you communicate with less technical people. You can learn what motivates different people within your organization and tailor your communication so that it matches the things they care about.
texts.text: The SBAR process offers you a great opportunity to improve your communication skills as an engineer, especially when you communicate with less technical people. You can learn what motivates different people within your organization and tailor your communication so that it matches the things they care about.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: These soft skills can also take your career to the next level. Highly technical people who communicate well about complex topics are always in demand.
texts.text: These soft skills can also take your career to the next level. Highly technical people who communicate well about complex topics are always in demand.
